questions.question: In PAGE, acrylamide and ________ polymerize to form the gel in SDS-PAGE.
In the gel polymerization reaction, ammonium persulfate (APS) and TEMED act as

answers.a: Initiator (source of free radical) and catalyst respectively
answers.b: Catalyst and Initiator (source of free radical) respectively
answers.c: A bridge between two acrylamide molecule

answers.a: Glycerol makes the samples dense and helps them to decent into the well.
answers.b: Glycerol provides a negative charge to the samples.

If a protein sample shows a molecular weight of 100kDa in when analysed by PAGE and gives a band at 20kDa and another at 30kDa molecular weight in SDS-PAGE, what is the stoichiometry of the protein complex?

answers.a: An oligomer made of a homodimer with each monomer = 20kDa and another homodimer with each monomer = 30kDa
answers.b: An oligomer made of a homodimer with each monomer = 10kDa and another homodimer with each monomer = 15kDa
answers.c: An oligomer made of a homodimer with each monomer = 50kDa
